pgAdminUserSecretRefName.description: Secret with admin credentials to the database server

pgSecretName.description: Name of the kubernetes user secret to create. Defaults to pg-user

database.description: Name of the Postgres database to create. Defaults to environment

pgUser.description: Name of the Postgres user to create

extensions.description: List of Postgres extensions to create in the new database. Defaults to `hstore pgcrypto citext uuid-ossp postgis pg_trgm unaccent`

useAzureFlex.description: Use an Azure Flex database. defaults to false
